title: Spectrophotometric Studies of Gaseous Nebulae.IV. The Orion Nebula.
abstract: view Abstract Citations (54) References (11) Co-Reads Similar Papers Volume Content Graphics Metrics Export Citation NASA/ADS Spectrophotometric Studies of Gaseous Nebulae.IV. The Orion Nebula. Kaler, James B. ; Aller, Lawrence H. ; Bowen, Ira S. Abstract Wavelengths, identifications, and intensities for emission lines of the Orion Nebula are given for the wavelength region X 3187-X 5016 A The intensities were corrected to outside the atmosphere by published photoelectric intensities and observation of a standard star. Lines as faint as 0.015 on the scale HP = 100 are recorded.
